textAfterTable: MicroData Summary for Pietro Boetto: Pietro Cardinal Boetto S.J. (born 19 May 1871, died 31 Jan 1946) Archbishop of Genova Consistory - 1935: Created Cardinal Conclave - 1939: Participated a priest for 44.5 years a bishop for 7.7 years a cardinal for 10.1 years Ordained Priest by: Bishop Emiliano Manacorda † Bishop of Fossano Principal Consecrator: Gennaro Cardinal Granito Pignatelli di Belmonte † Cardinal-Bishop of Ostia Principal Co-Consecrators: Archbishop Giuseppe Migone † Titular Archbishop of Nicomedia Archbishop Giovanni Battista Federico Vallega † Titular Archbishop of Nicopolis in Epiro Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Gennaro Cardinal Granito Pignatelli di Belmonte † (1899) Cardinal-Bishop of Ostia Mariano Cardinal Rampolla del Tindaro † (1882) Cardinal-Priest of Santa Cecilia Edward Henry Cardinal Howard † (1872) Archpriest of the Basilica di San Pietro in Vaticano {Saint Peter Basilica} Carlo Cardinal Sacconi † (1851) Cardinal-Bishop of Palestrina Giacomo Filippo Cardinal Fransoni † (1822) Cardinal-Priest of Santa Maria in Ara
